mapper.select:
select gugun.gugun, gugun.name from gugun inner join city on gugun.city = city.city
where city.name=#{city}
select city, gugun, dong, lat, lng from dongcode where city=#{city} and gugun=#{gugun}
select dong, jibun, Aptname, lat, lng from houseinfo
select lat, lng from dongcode where city=#{city} and gugun=#{gugun} and dong =#{dong}
select distinct dongcode from dongcode where gugun=#{gugun} and dong=#{dong}
select dong, Aptname, dealAmount, area, jibun from housedeal where code=#{code} and dong=#{dong}
